## serialization.blocks.BlockSerializer.save() method

Serializes the blocks of the given workspace.

**Signature:**

```typescript
save(workspace: Workspace): {
        languageVersion: number;
        blocks: State[];
    } | null;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  workspace | [Workspace](./blockly.workspace.md) | The workspace to save the blocks of. |

**Returns:**

{ languageVersion: number; blocks: [State](./blockly.serialization.blocks.state.md)<!-- -->\[\]; } \| null

The state of the workspace's blocks, or null if there are no blocks.
